Description: A display template evaluated relative to the related record when it is calculated to be current
Mandatory?: No. Will default to displaying the preferred label of the record

Description: The code of the DateRange metadata element used when calculating current location.
Mandatory?: Yes for all primary types except ca_storage_locations, for which date is derived from the object-storage location relationship.

Description: A color to highlight entries of this type with. Should be six-digit hex color
